name: The Facility (itch) (Rowls)
description:
You have awakened in a facility that has been over taken by ghouls and you need to find the key card to the elevator to escape.

In this short Horror/Action  experience you will find:

Never the same playthrough as the key card spawns in different locations.

Basic combat 

This is my first 3D game made in unreal. 

The game should take up to 5-10 min.
